items.sentence: Let me stay with you just five more minutes.
He apologized to me for stepping on my foot.
He had no difficulty explaining the mystery.
You\'re making a mountain out of a molehill.
I\'ll never forget the sound the crash made.
I\'ll never forget what you just did for me.
I\'ll return your books as soon as possible.
I\'ll see to it that it never happens again.
Tom vanished under mysterious circumstances.
Tom visits me every time he comes to Boston.
Tom wakes up at the crack of dawn every day.
Tom wanted Mary to drive him to the airport.
Do you have any idea where Tom put the keys?
Do you know the girl standing by the window?
Do you know what time the post office opens?
Do you listen to music when you are driving?
Do you plan to continue working until 10:00?
Do you promise not to tell anybody anything?
All my friends encouraged me to try my best.
All the passengers were saved from drowning.
